Headline: #47 47th and #48 South Damen Temporary Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 47 47th and 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Hoyne, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th and #48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Hoyne, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound #47 47th buses will operate via 47th, Damen, 51st, Western, 47th and over regular route.

Northbound #48 Damen buses will operate via Damen, 51st, Western and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute at 65th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wentworth, Marquette, Halsted, 63rd and Wentworth, due to street blockage near 65th/Wentworth

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wentworth, Marquette, Halsted, 63rd and Wentworth, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 65th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.
